page.title: 14LIFE STYLES
page.content: Hayling is at the moment suffering from a serious lack of entertainment, and what there is is mostly for older people and most of the clubs are for 18 year olds. There are very few night clubs except for Bennets and the Solent Club. There are no cinemas and only one theatre which is called the Barn Theatre. This is used by drama groups.There is an activities centre where all ages can make entertainment (play bridge) be entertained or play sports such as badminton,aerobics and karate. Old peoples groups,ladies groups and a youth group also meet there. Seacourt Club is a private members only club and offers real tennis,badminton,rackets,lawn tennis and squash. There is quite a big junior section. The beach is the most important aspect and features things like sunbathing,swimming & windsurfing
